div.span: Internet Banking System - API Application - Components

div.style: color: rgb(46, 98, 149); display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;
color: rgb(255, 255, 255); display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;

span.div:
Stores all of the core
banking information about
customers, accounts,
transactions, etc.

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255); display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;

span.div:
The internal Microsoft
Exchange e-mail system.

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255); display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;

span.div:
Provides all of the Internet
banking functionality to
customers via their web
browser.

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255); display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;

span.div:
Provides a limited subset of
the Internet banking
functionality to customers
via their mobile device.

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;

span.div:
Allows users to sign in to
the Internet Banking System.

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;

span.div:
Provides customers with a
summary of their bank
accounts.

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;

span.div:
Allows users to reset their
passwords with a single use
URL.

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;

span.div:
Provides functionality
related to signing in,
changing passwords, etc.

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;

span.div:
A facade onto the mainframe
banking system.

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;
color: rgb(255, 255, 255); display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;

span.div:
Stores user registration
information, hashed
authentication credentials,
access logs, etc.
